originalText.text: Dr. Park is an outstanding orthodontist. I have recently completed an Invisalign treatment with her, and I had a wonderful experience. She guided me through the process very thoroughly, answering all my questions and concerns. Her expertise, precision, and skill were evident throughout my treatment process, and I am very satisfied with my results. Her staff is equally warm and professional. I highly recommend Dr. Park!

originalText.text: Dr Park and her staff are amazing! My 3 sons have been patients of hers for braces for over 10 years. My husband and I also are patients using Invisalign to straighten our teeth. Dr Park really cares about her patients and takes time to explain the process. I can’t recommend her enough S she will help you look your best!

Dr Park really cares about her patients and takes time to explain the process. I can’t recommend her enough S she will help you look your best!

originalText.text: Dr. Bina Park's office was recommended to me by my dentist because my daughter has a crowded, small mouth that was going to need expert diagnoses and attention to detail for her braces. Not only did Dr. Bina and her assistants soothe my daughter's acute anxiety, they were able to swiftly make a clear plan of action for my daughter's teeth. Through the process we were kept informed and felt supported in making the decisions necessary to execute the plan to improve my daughter's oral health. The office is warm and professional beyond what you would expect from a standard orthodontist. The equipment used in the office is state of the art. There is no doubt in my mind that I made the correct decision in putting my daughter's orthodontic care in the hands of Dr. Bina Park. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: My two daughters and myself have recently completed care with Dr. Park. Dr. Park carefully balanced our needs as she helped each unique case achieve our best smile.  From small adjustments to complicated cases she has the expertise to handle it all.  She has been very helpful at advising both in office care and needed specialties outside her practice.  She is kind, thoughtful and a pleasure to see every 6 weeks.  Her staff are very helpful in scheduling and easy to work with.  We will miss seeing Dr. Park and her staff as frequently now that our care is complete but we would recommend her practice wholeheartedly. Each of us are very happy with our smiles. Thank you Dr. Park Orthodontics!

originalText.text: Dr. Park, an outstanding orthodontist, provided exceptional care tailored to the specific needs of each of my children. With expertise in both Invisalign and traditional braces, she ensured that one child received Invisalign and the other traditional braces as appropriate for their orthodontic correction, resulting in both children achieving beautiful smiles and comfortable, stable bites. Dr. Park and her dedicated team exemplified professionalism, compassion, and efficiency throughout the treatment process, never keeping us waiting—a rare and invaluable experience that I wish all my children's doctors could emulate.
